welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pelham, USA! Get ready to experience the charming city known for its historic landmarks, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Pelham has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport serves airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport serves airlines such as United, Frontier, and Allegiant.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
